name: Right of Final Interpretation
description:
Combat Action: When Yanfei is your active character, equip this card.
After Yanfei equips this card, she will immediately use Seal of Approval once.
When Yanfei uses a Charged Attack with this card equipped: Deal +1 DMG to enemies with 6 or less HP.
(You must have Yanfei in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1308]</color> is your active character, equip this card.
After $[A1308] equips this card, she will immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S13081]</color> once.
When $[A1308] uses a $[K51] with this card equipped: Deal +1 DMG to enemies with 6 or less HP.
(You must have $[A1308] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When <color=#FFFFFFFF>Yanfei</color> is your active character, equip this card.
After Yanfei equips this card, she will immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Seal of Approval</color> once.
When Yanfei uses a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color> with this card equipped: Deal +1 DMG to enemies with 6 or less HP.
(You must have Yanfei in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: "When it comes to cards... Well, anything is permissible, so long as the rules don't forbid it."
source: Reward for inviting Yanfei to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
